# "Intel or Apple Silicon"

Before we move on, you need to determine if your Mac uses Intel or Apple Silicon.

To do this, click on the ï£¿ symbol in the upper left corner of the screen, and then click "About this Mac".

![Apple menu](apple_menu.png)

![About this Mac](about_this_mac.png){width=40%}

You have an Apple Silicon Mac if the first line says M1, M2 or M3.  
You have an Intel Mac if it says something with Intel.
